text: 13.50 Apo 17.4, 17.12 Pen Juda binɨb okok, kɨlop mɨlɨk yapek, amɨl man anɨb ak bɨawl okok ayɨp, binawl Juda mel pen Juda binɨb gɨpal tek adek ak kɨdek gɨl God nop agnɨgɨlak okok ayɨp, kɨlop agel, gos tɨmel nɨgɨlak. Nɨgelak, kɨli am binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl dad apɨl, Pol ayɨp, Banabas ayɨp kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gɨl agyokɨlak.
